abstract: The footwear brand Sanuk selected Ignited and Johnson & Wales University in Providence, R.I., hired Fuseideas as agencies of record.
snippet: The footwear brand Sanuk selected Ignited and Johnson & Wales University in Providence, R.I., hired Fuseideas as agencies of record.
lead_paragraph: Bailey Lauerman, Omaha, was chosen to handle four accounts. The new clients are the Branson/Lakes Area Convention and Visitors Bureau, Branson, Mo.; IMG Academy, Bradenton, Fla.; the Mutual Fund Store, Overland Park, Kan.; and Panda Express, Rosemead, Calif. Billings were not disclosed.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Advertising Industry
